00093 DdNode *
00094 Cudd_Cofactor(
00095   DdManager * dd,
00096   DdNode * f,
00097   DdNode * g)
00098 {
00099     DdNode *res,*zero;
00100 
00101     zero = Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd));
00102     if (g == zero || g == DD_ZERO(dd)) {
00103         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Cudd_Cofactor: Invalid restriction 1\n");
00104         return(NULL);
00105     }
00106     do {
00107         dd->reordered = 0;
00108         res = cuddCofactorRecur(dd,f,g);
00109     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00110     return(res);
00111 
00112 } /* end of Cudd_Cofactor */

00131 void
00132 cuddGetBranches(
00133   DdNode * g,
00134   DdNode ** g1,
00135   DdNode ** g0)
00136 {
00137     DdNode      *G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00138 
00139     *g1 = cuddT(G);
00140     *g0 = cuddE(G);
00141     if (Cudd_IsComplement(g)) {
00142         *g1 = Cudd_Not(*g1);
00143         *g0 = Cudd_Not(*g0);
00144     }
00145 
00146 } /* end of cuddGetBranches */

00162 int
00163 cuddCheckCube(
00164   DdManager * dd,
00165   DdNode * g)
00166 {
00167     DdNode *g1,*g0,*one,*zero;
00168     
00169     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00170     if (g == one) return(1);
00171     if (Cudd_IsConstant(g)) return(0);
00172 
00173     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00174     cuddGetBranches(g,&g1,&g0);
00175 
00176     if (g0 == zero) {
00177         return(cuddCheckCube(dd, g1));
00178     }
00179     if (g1 == zero) {
00180         return(cuddCheckCube(dd, g0));
00181     }
00182     return(0);
00183 
00184 } /* end of cuddCheckCube */

00199 DdNode *
00200 cuddCofactorRecur(
00201   DdManager * dd,
00202   DdNode * f,
00203   DdNode * g)
00204 {
00205     DdNode *one,*zero,*F,*G,*g1,*g0,*f1,*f0,*t,*e,*r;
00206     unsigned int topf,topg;
00207     int comple;
00208 
00209     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00210     if (cuddIsConstant(F)) return(f);
00211 
00212     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00213 
00214     /* The invariant g != 0 is true on entry to this procedure and is
00215     ** recursively maintained by it. Therefore it suffices to test g
00216     ** against one to make sure it is not constant.
00217     */
00218     if (g == one) return(f);
00219     /* From now on, f and g are known not to be constants. */
00220 
00221     comple = f != F;
00222     r = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,Cudd_Cofactor,F,g);
00223     if (r != NULL) {
00224         return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple));
00225     }
00226 
00227     topf = dd->perm[F->index];
00228     G = Cudd_Regular(g);
00229     topg = dd->perm[G->index];
00230 
00231     /* We take the cofactors of F because we are going to rely on
00232     ** the fact that the cofactors of the complement are the complements
00233     ** of the cofactors to better utilize the cache. Variable comple
00234     ** remembers whether we have to complement the result or not.
00235     */
00236     if (topf <= topg) {
00237         f1 = cuddT(F); f0 = cuddE(F);
00238     } else {
00239         f1 = f0 = F;
00240     }
00241     if (topg <= topf) {
00242         g1 = cuddT(G); g0 = cuddE(G);
00243         if (g != G) { g1 = Cudd_Not(g1); g0 = Cudd_Not(g0); }
00244     } else {
00245         g1 = g0 = g;
00246     }
00247 
00248     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00249     if (topf >= topg) {
00250         if (g0 == zero || g0 == DD_ZERO(dd)) {
00251             r = cuddCofactorRecur(dd, f1, g1);
00252         } else if (g1 == zero || g1 == DD_ZERO(dd)) {
00253             r = cuddCofactorRecur(dd, f0, g0);
00254         } else {
00255             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Cudd_Cofactor: Invalid restriction 2\n");
00256             return(NULL);
00257         }
00258         if (r == NULL) return(NULL);
00259     } else /* if (topf < topg) */ {
00260         t = cuddCofactorRecur(dd, f1, g);
00261         if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00262         cuddRef(t);
00263         e = cuddCofactorRecur(dd, f0, g);
00264         if (e == NULL) {
00265             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00266             return(NULL);
00267         }
00268         cuddRef(e);
00269 
00270         if (t == e) {
00271             r = t;
00272         } else if (Cudd_IsComplement(t)) {
00273             r = cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)F->index,Cudd_Not(t),Cudd_Not(e));
00274             if (r != NULL)
00275                 r = Cudd_Not(r);
00276         } else {
00277             r = cuddUniqueInter(dd,(int)F->index,t,e);
00278         }
00279         if (r == NULL) {
00280             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd ,e);
00281             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd ,t);
00282             return(NULL);
00283         }
00284         cuddDeref(t);
00285         cuddDeref(e);
00286     }
00287 
00288     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,Cudd_Cofactor,F,g,r);
00289 
00290     return(Cudd_NotCond(r,comple));
00291 
00292 } /* end of cuddCofactorRecur */
